title: Tour Down Under First Look: The Most Buzzed About New Bike in WorldTour Cycling
content:
For 2025 XDS Astana announced a new team name and a new bike. We’ve seen studio pictures but now it’s broken cover at the Tour Down Under.

Read the full article at Tour Down Under First Look: The Most Buzzed About New Bike in WorldTour Cycling on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
